attributes.action: Run The Tube Late On Fridays And Saturdays
attributes.additional_details:
During the Olympics, TFL had the tube running late throughout the Games which made it easier for everyone to get around at night and did away with the worry of missing the last train home and being stranded in central London.
Given that London has a busy nighttime economy, it would make sense to keep the tube running late on Friday and Saturday nights to help people get home safely and easily when they have been out late.
The night buses currently on offer are over-crowded and infrequent.
Please work with Transport For London, The Mayor of London and the transport unions to keep the tube running late at night on Fridays and Saturdays. It would be a boost to London's nighttime economy and make journeys home safer and simpler.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
